amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to carry out the program known as "Operation Choke Point".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for Operation Chokepoint.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A085) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A085) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A085) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
